subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish won the final at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships, rallying for a 5-7, 6-3, 6-4 victory over fourth-seeded Olivier Rochus in Newport, R.I.
snippet: Mardy Fish won the final at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships, rallying for a 5-7, 6-3, 6-4 victory over fourth-seeded Olivier Rochus in Newport, R.I.
